title: How do I change my SN now?
body:
I have a tendency to change my name every time I get enought IP to buy a 7800 champ and SN change cause I already have everything unlocked, but I can't find the place to do it this time and I think I've gone all over the shop 

Help pls :D

replies.body: The store was recently [refreshed](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/jwhApRPE-store-visual-update-incoming), so some things have been moved around.  When accessing the store, you will find a little icon that looks like the silhouette of a person on the top right that leads to account options.  You will be able to find your summoner name change there!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Found it! Thanks a lot Rito <3
